description: A collection of circles in a roughly spade-shaped formation; a thin line of circles connects the spade-shaped formation to a vertical almond-shaped formation. Above both formations is a wide ovular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a pale peach-colored triangle at the bottom right of the ovular formation and a light blue triangle at the top of the spade-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
